column5: Hi all,Just got back from Antigua. Nice to take a break from Northwestern Ontario winter, even when its a mild one.Hope this don't melt the ice too much….just a vid of me wading the mangroves….I think snook look like walleye.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sIHxPy3YxMganother holiday instalment. This time its some footage of me casting from the beach. I had taken a couple of days off from fishing but after seeing all the baitfish at my feet the temptation was too great, my wife was understanding https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OsVT...ature=youtu.be
I give that a thumbs up! Nice little mid winter "fix".Pooch
Wishing I was back there now -32C here this morning.
Went to Jamaica. Visited Bob Marley's birthplace. Brownies better than mangos.Spring is around the corner....desperate as Feb is, we are over the hump.
Or as a co worker has named Wednesdays "hump the lump day"
